name: IF - Dusttale
description:
Story

You fell.

Not a small fall, or a little trip.

This is a plunging fall. It is a heels-over-head fall. It is an over-a-minute-has-passed-and-you're-still-falling fall.

You are hurtling into darkness so thick you cannot even see your fingers in front of your own eyes. The air tingles with a strange energy that envelops you entirely as you fall, providing you with the sensation of tumbling through mist. 

You fall and fall and fall. 

You survive your fall.

You are injured. . . bleeding. . . dying. . . but alive.

You have fallen into a dark underground that is as silent and lifeless as a grave. There is only you, your heartbeat, and your shadow. With your current state, you're in no shape to even attempt to climb back out. You must push forward and hope to find another way up.

What you find is nothing like you expected.

Disclaimer: Undertale belongs to Toby Fox. DustTale was created by Ask-DustTale on Tumblr. All music credits are in the game under the disclaimer.

Author's Note:   This is not meant to be an easy game. There are no saves, nor back arrows. You can only RESET. 

There are three available HAPPY ENDINGS (two for friendship, one for romance). One NEUTRAL ending, and the rest are BAD ENDINGS.
